subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador moved closer to winning the Spanish Vuelta for a second time, while Daniele Bennati won the 18th stage.
snippet: Alberto Contador moved closer to winning the Spanish Vuelta for a second time, while Daniele Bennati won the 18th stage.
